channel.title: Ancient Curses [PI]
channel.description: What file or files would I look in to edit my prayers and what they do.

item.title: Ancient Curses [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote=“poop on u234, post:5, topic:388894”]Well i ave this in my clickingbuttons.java

/**Curses**/ case 87231://pItm c.getCombat().activateCurse(0); break; case 87233://sapWar c.getCombat().activateCurse(1); break; case 87235://sapRng c.getCombat().activateCurse(2); break; case 87237://sapMge c.getCombat().activateCurse(3); break; case 87239://sapSpirit c.getCombat().activateCurse(4); break; case 87241://Berserker c.getCombat().activateCurse(5); break; case 87243://defSum c.getCombat().activateCurse(6); break; case 87245://defMge c.getCombat().activateCurse(7); break; case 87247://defRng c.getCombat().activateCurse(8); break; case 87249://defMel c.getCombat().activateCurse(9); break; case 87251://leechWar c.getCombat().activateCurse(10); break; case 87253://leechRng c.getCombat().activateCurse(11); break; case 87255://leechMge c.getCombat().activateCurse(12); break; case 88001://leechDef c.getCombat().activateCurse(13); break; case 88003://leechStr c.getCombat().activateCurse(14); break; case 88005://leechRun c.getCombat().activateCurse(15); break; case 88007://leechSpec c.getCombat().activateCurse(16); break; case 88009://wrath c.getCombat().activateCurse(17); break; case 88011://soul split c.getCombat().activateCurse(18); break; case 88013://turmoil c.getCombat().activateCurse(19); break;

none of them have effects[/quote]

The effects arn’t called there, they’re just to basically activate them.

Read full topic

item.title: Ancient Curses [PI]
item.dc:creator: @poop_on_u234 poop on u234
item.description:
@poop_on_u234 wrote:

Well i ave this in my clickingbuttons.java

/**Curses**/ case 87231://pItm c.getCombat().activateCurse(0); break; case 87233://sapWar c.getCombat().activateCurse(1); break; case 87235://sapRng c.getCombat().activateCurse(2); break; case 87237://sapMge c.getCombat().activateCurse(3); break; case 87239://sapSpirit c.getCombat().activateCurse(4); break; case 87241://Berserker c.getCombat().activateCurse(5); break; case 87243://defSum c.getCombat().activateCurse(6); break; case 87245://defMge c.getCombat().activateCurse(7); break; case 87247://defRng c.getCombat().activateCurse(8); break; case 87249://defMel c.getCombat().activateCurse(9); break; case 87251://leechWar c.getCombat().activateCurse(10); break; case 87253://leechRng c.getCombat().activateCurse(11); break; case 87255://leechMge c.getCombat().activateCurse(12); break; case 88001://leechDef c.getCombat().activateCurse(13); break; case 88003://leechStr c.getCombat().activateCurse(14); break; case 88005://leechRun c.getCombat().activateCurse(15); break; case 88007://leechSpec c.getCombat().activateCurse(16); break; case 88009://wrath c.getCombat().activateCurse(17); break; case 88011://soul split c.getCombat().activateCurse(18); break; case 88013://turmoil c.getCombat().activateCurse(19); break;

none of them have effects

item.title: Ancient Curses [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Look in class ClickingButtons for it, click a prayer in game, look in the command prompt and search for the case ID.
